page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: There are many different styles of home life in the villages of the South Eastern area of{Bredon Hill.}The villages are knitted together by outside activities, which are very well supported, such as the W.I., Mothers Union, Wives Group, Over 60's Club, The Tuesday Club and the very talented Drama Group. Most people take pride in their gardens and some have them open to the public several times a year, to raise money for various charities. Most housewives take a pride in good cooking, some make bread, others ice and decorate cakes to a very high standard. Children mostly attend local schools but a few attend private schools in the nearby towns. Boarding at school is however very rare in these days.
